plot: The film's director Oh Dal Kyung. The story of three young people living alone ... But early in the Ba left without a mother and her father was brought up, but at age 20 she was forced to start an independent life, because her stepmother can not stand her - BA Yes, too much like his mother.It's like seeing your wife every day, her husband, and father of a daughter forced to leave and find another place to live for himself and his wife. Ha Nyl - the girl with the mental development of the 6-year-old child, but she has a phenomenal memory for numbers and a gift for playing musical instruments.Once, three years ago, her parents - father-and mother-conductor of the first violin in the orchestra - left to act in concert, but never returned - they hit a drunk driver. And now, three years she lived in her apartment with a cat playing the fiddle, and ordering a pizza.Jin Gu - an orphan, his parents died early, and soon his sister followed them. Man himself is forced to make a living, but sometimes he even no place to sleep. Jin Gu - intelligent and savvy guy, but he was unable to pursue higher education, and in fact, it has a lot of complexes, so this guy no one opens his heart.It is also a story about friendship, about how, when he met these three young and know nothing about the life of the people could change themselves and each other.
title: Haneulgwa Bada
